name: 嗜血印 BloodySpell 原生音乐集
detailed_description:
Song Tianxiang, the composer, is responsible for composition and music production in the game "The Bloody Ink". The music of "Heavenly Blood" is played by the top orchestras and famous performers in China. The number of orchestras is more than 30. In the style of music, the fusion of strong national colors and Western symphonies, the use of modern music style, to maintain the soundtrack characteristics of the film, bring you a musical feast of soul impact. The post-music downmix and mastering process is done by internationally renowned studios.

01. Royal Sky
02. Demon
03. Departure
04. Thinking
05. Wannian
06. Follow
07. Prologue
08. Reunion

This content requires a basic game BloodySpell on Steam to run. After downloading, the music files are in the BloodySpell game folder in the Steam directory.
